Text.Page:
Anarie wants your assistance at Camp Zakai. Apparently, word of your work is spreading.

On your way, see if you can kill some more {@LinkCreature:28#2011#smokepaw timberwolves}. They're getting out of hand again.

Thank you for meeting me. Your work has received much praise and I have need of a soldier like you.

My last team was destroyed and the Mysterium nearly banished me from their ranks. It took everything I had to secure a second chance. With your help, I won't squander this opportunity.
